hotspots.hotspot: The shared electrons spend less time orbiting the hydrogen atoms, leaving the positive proton by itself. Therefore, these regions of the water molecule have a slight positive charge.

Because it has more protons than the hydrogen atom, the oxygen atom attracts the electrons with a greater force. As a result, the shared electrons, with their negative charge, spend more time orbiting the oxygen atom, giving this region of the water molecule a slight negative charge.
